casebody.data:
No. 10-7283. Lewis L. Boniface, Petitioner v. Department of Homeland Security, et al. 562 U.S. 1150, 131 S. Ct. 931,

178 L. Ed. 2d 774,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 480. January 10, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.

Same case below, 392 U.S. App. D.C. 117, 613 F.3d 282.
